com.lukhol.spotsfinder.service

Interface UserService


  • public interface UserService
    User service which is providing User using some criteria. MobileApp use this service to log in and get information about user. Application also use this service to update user profile.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukasz

      • exists

        boolean exists(java.lang.Long id)
        Check if user exist in database using database identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - - database identifier of user
        Returns:
        return true if user with provided identifier exist in database

      • existsByEmail

        boolean existsByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Check if user exist in database using email.
        Parameters:
        email - - email to check
        Returns:
        true if user with provided email exist in database
